data preparation

read data

penguins=penguins

plotting

penguins  %>% 
  filter(!is.na(sex)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x     = flipper_length_mm,
             y     = bill_length_mm,
             color = sex,
             size  = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~species)

data split

# remove rows with missing sex
# exclude year and island
all_penguins_df =
  penguins %>% 
  drop_na(sex) %>% 
  select(-year, -island) %>% rename(target_variable=sex)
glimpse(all_penguins_df)
Rows: 333
Columns: 6
$ species           <fct> Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adel…
$ bill_length_mm    <dbl> 39.1, 39.5, 40.3, 36.7, 39.3, 38.9, 39.2, 41.1, 38.6…
$ bill_depth_mm     <dbl> 18.7, 17.4, 18.0, 19.3, 20.6, 17.8, 19.6, 17.6, 21.2…
$ flipper_length_mm <int> 181, 186, 195, 193, 190, 181, 195, 182, 191, 198, 18…
$ body_mass_g       <int> 3750, 3800, 3250, 3450, 3650, 3625, 4675, 3200, 3800…
$ target_variable   <fct> male, female, female, female, male, female, male, fe…
# hold out 10 for final testing

hold_penguins_df=slice(all_penguins_df,1:5)

penguins_df=slice(all_penguins_df,6:n())
dim(hold_penguins_df)
[1] 5 6
dim(penguins_df)
[1] 328   6
set.seed(1234)
data_split <- initial_validation_split(data=penguins_df, prop = c(0.7,0.2))

data_train=training(data_split)  

data_test=testing(data_split)  

data_valid=validation(data_split)
dim(data_train)
[1] 229   6
dim(data_test)
[1] 33  6

modeling

recipe

did not use recipe at this case

model

tree model

tree_spec <- decision_tree() %>%
  set_engine("rpart") %>%
  set_mode("classification")

KNN model

knn_spec <- nearest_neighbor() %>%
  set_engine("kknn") %>%
  set_mode("classification")

trainning

knn_fit <- knn_spec %>%
  fit(target_variable ~ ., data = data_train)

knn_fit
parsnip model object


Call:
kknn::train.kknn(formula = target_variable ~ ., data = data,     ks = min_rows(5, data, 5))

Type of response variable: nominal
Minimal misclassification: 0.1048035
Best kernel: optimal
Best k: 5
tree_fit <- tree_spec %>%
  fit(target_variable ~ ., data = data_train)

tree_fit
parsnip model object

n= 229

model result

Evaluate

Make predictions on the testing data

predictions <- predict(tree_fit,data_test) 

predictions_probability <- predict(tree_fit,data_test,type="prob")
data_test_result=cbind(data_test,predictions,predictions_probability) 
conf_mat(data_test_result, truth = target_variable,
    estimate = .pred_class)
          Truth
Prediction female male
    female     12    1
    male        8   12
metrics(data_test_result, target_variable, .pred_class)
# A tibble: 2 × 3
  .metric  .estimator .estimate
  <chr>    <chr>          <dbl>
1 accuracy binary         0.727
2 kap      binary         0.478
accuracy(data_test_result, truth = target_variable, estimate = .pred_class)
# A tibble: 1 × 3
  .metric  .estimator .estimate
  <chr>    <chr>          <dbl>
1 accuracy binary         0.727
sens(data_test_result, truth = target_variable,
    estimate = .pred_class)
# A tibble: 1 × 3
  .metric .estimator .estimate
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl>
1 sens    binary           0.6
spec(data_test_result, truth = target_variable,
    estimate = .pred_class)
# A tibble: 1 × 3
  .metric .estimator .estimate
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl>
1 spec    binary         0.923
all_metrics <- metric_set(accuracy, sens, spec)

all_metrics(data_test_result, truth = target_variable,estimate = .pred_class)
# A tibble: 3 × 3

  summary()

1 roc_auc binary         0.767
roc_curve(data_test_result, truth = target_variable, .pred_female) %>% 
  autoplot()

save model

check model size

library(lobstr)
obj_size(tree_fit)
73.58 kB

bundle and save model

library(bundle)
model_bundle <- bundle(tree_fit)
saveRDS(model_bundle,'model.RDS')

make predication

load model and unbundle

model=readRDS('model.RDS')

model <- unbundle(model)
final_prediction=predict(model,data_valid)
